headline: Greif to Sell Containerboard Business, Boost Debt-Reduction Efforts
summary: GEF to sell its Containerboard business to PKG for $1.8B, aiming to cut debt and sharpen strategic focus.

headline: PCA to acquire Greif’s containerboard business for $1.8bn
summary: Greif will utilise the takeover's cash proceeds for debt repayment, enhancing earnings security.
